extendedInfo.description: How Do You Say? is the easiest way to translate between over 35 languages!Itâs easy as 1, 2, 3:	1. Push the From box	2. Type in the text to translate	3. Push EnterThatâs it! Your sentence will automatically translate as you type!(You can also push the microphone button on your keyboard to speak your sentence)And when you are ready to switch the two languages, simple tap the circular arrow button to swap languages(Currently DIsabled). You can even verify your own translation using this button right after your translation is done. Selecting a language to translate from and to is done easily by simply push the globe icon next to the languages.Share the translated text with your friends using Facebook, Twitter, text, or email!!!(You must have those programs on your phone for sharing) Just simply push the share button next to the translated text.You will love our simple and beautiful design. (Internet Access required)Keywords: world language translator, many language, translate, translator, foreign, language, travel, learning, foreign language helper, tour, tourist

reviews.title: Simple Translator
reviews.comment: I wish there were more languages I like how it works and setup I just wish you would add Filipino or Tagalog language. Otherwise I have no use for it but I will gladly give it 5 stars if there was a Filipino language added.
reviews.author: Sarah R

reviews.title: could use some work
reviews.comment: so far its been great, but it would be better if you could add a listen button so we could see how its pronounced. otherwise it is very very awesome!!

reviews.title: Good app it wokes well!

reviews.title: Title, how do you say
reviews.comment: If the title illustrates something, I should expect to get that something. I can\'t say it, if I can\'t pronounce it. I can\'t pronounce it, if I can\'t hear it. Five stars when I can hear it.
